headlines.title: Russia claims to have pushed into central Ukrainian region for first time
headlines.description: Russia claimed Sunday that its forces are for the first time pushing into the central Ukrainian region of Dnipropetrovsk, an area it has been trying to reach for months, in a move that could create new problems for Kyiv’s much-stretched forces.

headlines.title: Athletes express concern over NCAA settlement's impact on non-revenue sports
headlines.description: The $2.8 billion NCAA settlement is being touted as a path to stability for college sports, clearing the way for schools to pay their athletes within certain parameters.

headlines.title: Xbox console games are suddenly showing up inside the Xbox PC app
headlines.description: Microsoft has started showing Xbox console games inside the Xbox PC app. It’s part of Microsoft’s ongoing work to bring Xbox and Windows closer together.

headlines.title: Trump sending National Guard troops to LA-area protests against ICE
headlines.description: The president is deploying 2,000 troops to Los Angeles, where protests Saturday led to clashes between immigration authorities and demonstrators, despite Gov. Gavin Newsom's objections.

headlines.title: French Open final: Coco Gauff beats Aryna Sabalenka to win second Grand Slam title
headlines.description: Gauff won her first Roland Garros title by playing the conditions and the occasion with more evenness than Sabalenka.

headlines.title: Ukraine drone barrage targets Moscow as Zelenskyy demands accountability for Putin
headlines.description: At least 10 Ukrainian drones were shot down on their approach to Moscow overnight into Sunday morning, according to the city's mayor.

headlines.title: UFC 316: Merab Dvalishvili stops Sean O’Malley to retain title
headlines.description: With US President Donald Trump in attendance, Dvalishvili dominates challenger O’Malley in a third-round victory.

headlines.title: Coco Gauff responds to Aryna Sabalenka over ‘not fair’ French Open final claim
headlines.description: In an extraordinary press conference, Sabalenka claimed Gauff would have lost to Iga Swiatek and said the French Open winner had been ‘framing’ balls during the final

headlines.title: What's at stake in US-China trade talks in London
headlines.description: U.S.-China trade talks in London this week are expected to take up a series of disputes that have buffeted relations.

headlines.title: Los Angeles protests live: Donald Trump deploys California National Guard to city after clashes over immigration raids
headlines.description: The US president says he's sending in 2,000 troops to deal with unrest over raids on undocumented migrants.
